artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,637); man at left in yellow breeches, orange vest, green coat, black hat, holding a walking stick; woman at right in a pink gown with a green overgown, a fan, and a tall hat with gray bows and plumes
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Seconde Année, Dix-huitième Cahier, 15 Août 1791
